{{Tutorial
|title    = Dreadful Withering...
|subtitle = Exploration Knowledge
|type     = Adventure
|icon     = Icon Tutorial Combat.png
|about    = The Withering
|image1   = Tutorial Dreadful Withering... 1.png
|text1    = [[The Withering]] is not a fixed location. Instead, it refers to areas that have been corroded by some sort of mysterious and ominous power. In these areas, [[characters]] will accumulate Decay. The speed of this accumulation will differ depending on the Withering Zone you're in.
|image2   = Tutorial Dreadful Withering... 2.png
|text2    = Depending on how much Decay you have accumulated, all your [[party]] members will have their {{Color|help|All Elemental RES, Physical RES, and Max HP decreased}}. These stats will decrease more in accordance with the amount of Decay accrued.
|image3   = Tutorial Dreadful Withering... 3.png
|text3    = If you remain within Withering Zones after you fully accumulate Decay, all your party members will {{Color|help|fall}}.
|image4   = Tutorial Dreadful Withering... 4.png
|text4    = You {{Color|help|must use the power of the Dendrograna}} to clear the Withering away. Only via this method can you destroy the Withering Branches that spread this corrosive power. {{Color|help|Only when all the Withering Branches within a Withering Zone are destroyed can the Tumor of the Withering at the beating heart of the area be destroyed}}.<br>Most Withering Zones can be destroyed in this way, but...
|image5   = Tutorial Dreadful Withering... 5.png
|text5    = Within the Withering Zones, [[Candles of Life]] and [[Flames of Life]] may appear and help to decrease the accumulation of Decay.<br>Prepare for the worst before entering the Withering Zones.
|sort     = 6150
}}
